articles.author: Christopher Rogers
articles.title: Jennifer Garner says her three children trick her into getting more pets on The Ellen DeGeneres Show - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'My kids have discovered that if they want to have pets, instead of me saying no, they give me [them] for my birthday or for Mother's Day,' the 48-year-old actress told the talk show host.
articles.content:
Jennifer Garner has her kids to thank for why her already full house keeps getting busier.
